page.title: 14 COMMUNICATIONS LITCHAM
page.content: In this area the possible sources of news are:the local radio station,parish magazine,local television news programmes such as"About Anglia",local papers such as the"Dereham and Fakenham Times",The popular types of news that we get are things like :ceremoneys such as weddings,social gatherings such as barn dances and village fates plus maybe petty crime reports and news about local organizations such as socialclubs,schools and brownie packs. In this area many people complain about the low flying aircraft that come from the surrounding air bases such as"Raynham Air Base.They also complain about the roads which are bad with potholes and ruts and they are always covered in mud from the tractors wheels.
